word:
As ministers and Bible workers are called to other labors, let the members of our churches say to them, "Go forward with your appointed work, and we will continue to labor for the circulation of "Object Lessons," and for the freedom of our schools." Let no one feel that this work should stop with the special effort of 1900 and 1901. 
                                                                           2
The field is never exhausted, and this book should be sold for the help of our schools for years to come.
